text: Yuri Dyulgerov (born 8 June 1965) is a Bulgarian rower. He competed in the men's eight event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Bulgaria Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers from Sofia
title: Yuri Dyulgerov
